snippet: The Athletics, with no new stadium in sight, entered the All-Star break in range of a wild-card spot, with their general manager, Billy Beane, adding a twist to his stockpiling of prospects.
abstract: The Athletics, with no new stadium in sight, entered the All-Star break in range of a wild-card spot, with their general manager, Billy Beane, adding a twist to his stockpiling of prospects.

headline.main: Beane and A's Build Potential Contender, if Nothing Else
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: Beane and A’s Build Potential Contender, if Nothing Else
